article_title: Obamacare contraceptive case produces high court compromise
article_text:
02:16

Black pastors rally in support of HB2, saying LGBT rights are not civil rights

article_metadata.title: Obamacare contraceptive case produces high court compromise | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: The U.S. Supreme Court deferred resolving a divisive clash between the Obama administration and faith-based groups over insurance coverage for contraceptives under Obamacare.
og.title: Obamacare contraceptive case produces high court compromise
